alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 7:50PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Box Elder County through 830 PM MDT... At 750 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 25 miles northeast of Montello, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grouse Creek and Etna. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 32 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
